author: Cnn Com Wire Service
title: They bought a cheap home in Italy. Then they bought another
description: When Italian villages started selling houses for the price of a cup of coffee, most foreign buyers rushing to grab a slice of the action saw it as a fun property hunt – a search for the ultimate bargain. But for some, buying an old home in an offbeat location has turned out to be a life-changer.

author: Cnn.Com Wire Service
title: They bought a cheap home in Italy. Then they bought another
description: When Italian villages started selling houses for the price of a cup of coffee, most foreign buyers rushing to grab a slice of the action saw it as a fun property hunt – a search for the ultimate bargain. author: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Jada Jones)
title: 'Scientifically-proven' £20 teeth whitening solution hailed 'game-changer' for anyone wanting to erase 'decades of tea, coffee and fizzy drink stains'
description: "As a coffee addict let me tell you I had given up all hope on removing stains on my teeth. UNTIL my friend introduced me to these strips and I am so happy she did. Now I can enjoy my coffee a little extra knowing there is a cure to these stains."

author: mliss1578
title: Emma Thompson Abhors The Word “Content” (And We Don’t Blame Her): “You Don’t Want To Hear Your Stories Described As ‘Content’”
description: "That’s just like coffee grounds in the sink or something," she said.

author: Phoebe Cox
title: Customers flock to Starbucks after official Mansfield opening
description: The popular coffee franchise has opened its doors in Mansfield – bringing a taste of Seattle to the town.

author: Emma Dukes
title: Nine of Liverpool’s best independent coffee shops - perfect for a cosy cuppa this autumn
description: These Liverpool coffee shops are ideal for grabbing a pumpkin spice latte and sheltering from the cold autumnal weather.

author: Cnn.Com Wire Service
title: San Francisco McDonald’s sued after elderly customer burns herself on hot coffee
description: McDonald’s is being sued over a hot coffee spill, again. This time, a SF location is being accused of serving a “scalding” cup of coffee with an improperly attached lid, which allegedly resulted in the coffee pouring out on plaintiff and causing “severe burns” after she tried drinking it.

author: Fox Business
title: McDonald’s sued after hot coffee leaves elderly woman with ‘severe burns,’ echoing famous ‘90’s case
description: Mabel Childress is suing McDonald’s over a hot coffee spill that’s reminiscent of the 1992 incident that made national headlines.

author: Jay Redfern
title: Orange Cup makes Grand debut: Popular coffee shop opens third Galesburg location
description: The small building will feature a single-window drive-thru and serve Orange Cup’s wide variety of coffee drinks, along with assorted food items

author: Sarah Fitton
title: Delicious Cafe: Busy coffee shop with outdoor seating in heart of Halifax town centre goes up for sale
description: A popular Halifax town centre cafe has gone up for sale.

author: Fielding Buck
title: Klatch Coffee throws a four-day celebration for its 30th anniversary
description: The Rancho Cucamonga roastery is known for its success in barista competitions and super high-end cups of coffee.

author: Daniel Egitto
title: Alleged tip-jar thief arrested in state park
description: Brett Badiali, 26, began his alleged misdeeds around 8 a.m. at a coffee shop on Solano Square.

author: Standard Business
title: Agency mulls lab to enhance coffee pricing at the auction
description: Nairobi Coffee Exchange has proposed the setting up of a cupping laboratory to help determine the value of the commodity vis-a-vis what the buyer is offering and the reserve price.

author: Scott Yunker
title: HawaiʻiUSA, Maui Oma launch new coffee to help Maui nonprofit, Imua Family Services
description: HawaiʻiUSA and Maui Oma Coffe Roasting Company created a custom coffee blend named 'Imua,' which appeared on store shelves this week. Proceeds from Imua Coffee purchases will go towards the nonprofit Imua Family Services.

author: Olivia Doak
title: CU Boulder professor creates 3D printing paste with coffee grounds
description: A CU Boulder professor created a 3D printing paste with coffee grounds to help reduce waste and improve sustainability of 3D printing.

author: Kate Ryan
title: Labor expert says union efforts have a ripple effect across industries
description: From coffee shops to factory floors, the actions by unions are having an impact on wages and benefits.

author: Bevan Hurley
title: McDonald’s sued over hot coffee spill three decades after landmark case
description: Mable Childress, 85, allegedly suffered severe burns after she was handed a coffee cup with a loose lid

author: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Liam Buckler)
title: McDonald's sued by woman 'scalded by burnt coffee that left her with severe burns'
description: Mable Childress, who is in her 80s, has launched a lawsuit against a McDonald's in San Francisco after she claimed employees at the Fillmore Street store “failed to properly secure the coffee cup lid”
